attributes.action: Reasonable wages for commission based jobs during holidays and sickness.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many employers only pay basic wages to workers on commission based jobs during sickness or during holidays.

This causes many problems.

Employers should be forced to pay a reasonable wage during these instances. For example possibly the average of the last 6 months earnings.

In London for example some wages are 10k per year for 6 day weeks 11 hour days. The wage is only made up with commissions. 

In the even of a problem the worker could not survive.
